attributes.action: Make Western Ukraine a Safe Haven
attributes.additional_details: If we choose not to fight now, we can expect to have to fight later and much closer to home. It is the morally right thing to do.
attributes.background: Our government needs to stand up to dictators. Putin will only stop when we force him to stop. We need to create a safe haven backed by the threat of military force to enforce it if the Russian military enters

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We understand you're concerned about the safety of civilians in Ukraine, but we're not sure what you want a "safe haven" in Western Ukraine to look like, or what actions you want the Government to take to help establish this.

You might like to sign the following petition, which calls for a related action:

Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314
